sense.gloss: to be troubled, to have difficulty, to be in a fix, to be at a loss, to be stumped, to be embarrassed
to be bothered, to be inconvenienced, to be annoyed
to be badly off, to be hard up, to be in straitened circumstances
having great difficulty with, struggling greatly with, being in distress
to trouble with questions, to embarrass, to put out, to put on the spot, to inconvenience
to be at a complete loss, to be without recourse, to be completely stymied, to have absolutely no idea what to do
to be greatly perplexed, to be at a loss, to be sorely troubled, to be greatly embarrassed

sdata.j: ライ↑麦↑↓むぎ↓は↑貧困↑↓ひんこん↓の↑穀物↑↓こくもつ↓と↑称↑↓しょう↓されていた。
sdata.e: Rye was called the grain of poverty.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑困難↑↓こんなん↓に↑直面↑↓ちょくめん↓するだろう。
sdata.e: You will be up against many difficulties.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑困難↑↓こんなん↓を↑克服↑↓こくふく↓しなければならない。
sdata.e: You have to overcome the difficulties.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はこのまま↑収入↑↓しゅうにゅう↓↑不相応↑↓ふそうおう↓な↑暮↑↓く↓らしを↑続↑↓つづ↓ければ↑金↑↓きん↓に↑困↑↓こま↓って↑身動↑↓みうご↓きがとれなくなるだろう。
sdata.e: You'll find yourself in deep water if you continue to live beyond your means.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑困難↑↓こんなん↓な↑立場↑↓たちば↓を↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑説明↑↓せつめい↓しなさい。
sdata.e: Explain to him the difficult situation you are in.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑困↑↓こま↓った↑性分↑↓しょうぶん↓はしゃべりすぎることだ。
sdata.e: The trouble with you is that you talk too much.

sdata.j: ↑困難↑↓こんなん↓なくして↑栄冠↑↓えいかん↓なし。
↑困難↑↓こんなん↓なくして↑栄冠↑↓えいかん↓なし。
↑私↑↓わたし↓はお↑金↑↓かね↓に↑困↑↓こま↓っている。
↑金↑↓きん↓には↑困↑↓こま↓っていないよ。

words.gloss: to be troubled, to have difficulty, to be in a fix, to be at a loss, to be stumped, to be embarrassed
